line_1: With ev'ning chat and sober reading tir'd;
line_2: 'TWAS night; and FLAVIA to her room retir'd,

line_1: Tyro stood neuter, till the champions tir'd,
line_2: In languid attitudes a truce desir'd,

line_1: And lest the Flames behind them Tir'd.
line_2: But wing'd with Glory They Aspird,

line_1: At length you fink, by cruel Treatment tir'd,
line_2: By hooting Boys to higher Phrenzy fir'd,

line_1: At length with fruitless wishes tired,
line_2: Who, pitying power! a thought inspired

line_1: And tiring others, till he's tir'd,
And seem'd to say they never could be tir'd;
line_2: When all things with new vigour were inspir'd,

line_1: Of Joy impatient and as quickly tir'd,
line_2: See restless Cloe, fond to be admir'd,

line_1: Who, when the sated Appetite is tir'd,
line_2: Even loath the Thoughts of what they once admir'd.

line_1: For ever exercis'd, yet never tir'd;
line_2: Good, from each object, from each place acquir'd,

line_1: And still as each repeated pleasure tir'd,
line_2: Succeeding sports the mirthful band inspir'd;

line_1: Ev'n by the king's professor, tir'd
Now stung with Scoffs, and now with Flatt'ry tir'd,
